languages.text: "Я каталогизировала данные, когда на одном из дальных постов начались нападения. Я сразу же распознала врага по тактике: друкари. Они выбрали заштатный беззащитный мир, в котором ночь длится полгода! Когда пять форпостов поглотила тьма, последнего астропата разорвали в клочья, а многочисленные призывы на помощь, отправленные членам группы Калькасара, остались без ответа, я поняла — никто не спасет этих людей. Эти... знания. И тогда я поставила их на службу Человечеству".

"I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Я каталогизировала данные, когда на одном из дальных постов начались нападения. Я сразу же распознала врага по тактике: друкари. Они выбрали заштатный беззащитный мир, в котором ночь длится полгода! Когда пять форпостов поглотила тьма, последнего астропата разорвали в клочья, а многочисленные призывы на помощь, отправленные членам группы Калькасара, остались без ответа, я поняла — никто не спасет этих людей. Эти... знания. И тогда я поставила их на службу Человечеству".

languages.text: “那个时候，我正在编纂相关的条目，而我们偏远的哨站遭到了袭击。我观察着敌人的战术，一眼就认出了他们的真实身份。他们是黑暗灵族，他们选择了一个毫不起眼、没有丝毫防御能力的世界作为猎物，这个世界的黑夜整整长达半年之久！后来，五个哨站都在黑暗中消逝，最后的星语者被撕成了碎片，而无数发给卡尔卡扎的求救信号也没有得到任何回应。那时我意识到，不会再有援军来拯救这些人了，或者说……这些知识。于是，我决定让这些知识发挥作用，为人类造福。”
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，我正在编纂相关的条目，而我们偏远的哨站遭到了袭击。我观察着敌人的战术，一眼就认出了他们的真实身份。他们是黑暗灵族，他们选择了一个毫不起眼、没有丝毫防御能力的世界作为猎物，那个世界的黑夜甚至会长达半年之久！后来，五个哨站都在黑暗中消逝，最后的星语者被撕成了碎片，而无数发给卡尔卡扎的求救信号也没有得到任何回应。那时我意识到，不会再有援军来拯救这些人了，或者说……这些知识。于是，我决定让这些知识发挥作用，为人类造福。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Estaba catalogando datos cuando los ataques comenzaron en uno de los puestos avanzados más remotos. Reconocí al instante al enemigo por sus tácticas: Drukhari. ¡Eligieron un planeta irrelevante e indefenso en el que la noche dura medio año! Al final, con cinco puestos devorados por las sombras, el último astrópata desgarrado y ni una respuesta a mis llamadas de socorro a la unidad de Calcazar, comprendí que nadie iba a salvar a esta gente. Ni a este... saber. De modo que utilicé el conocimiento por el bien de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba catalogando datos cuando los ataques comenzaron en uno de los puestos avanzados más remotos. Reconocí al instante al enemigo por sus tácticas: Drukhari. ¡Eligieron un planeta irrelevante e indefenso en el que la noche dura medio año! Al final, con cinco puestos devorados por las sombras, el último astrópata desgarrado y ni una respuesta a mis llamadas de socorro a la unidad de Calcazar, comprendí que nadie iba a salvar a esta gente. Ni a este... saber. De modo que utilicé el conocimiento por el bien de la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「遠隔の前哨基地の一つで攻撃が始まったとき、私はデータのカタログを作成していました。私はすぐにその戦術から敵がデュカーリであることに気づきました。彼らが選んだのは、一年の半分が夜の、何の変哲もない無防備な世界だった！5つの前哨基地が闇に飲み込まれ、最後の感応通信官が引き裂かれ、カルカサルの部隊に送られた多くの助けを求める呼びかけが応答されることはなかった。私は誰もこれらの人々を救おうとしないことに気づきました。またはこの…知識を。それで私はその知識を人類の利益のために活用しました」
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「遠隔の前哨基地の一つで攻撃が始まったとき、私はデータのカタログを作成していました。私はすぐにその戦術から敵がデュカーリであることに気づきました。彼らが選んだのは、一年の半分が夜の、何の変哲もない無防備な世界だった！5つの前哨基地が闇に飲み込まれ、最後の感応通信官が引き裂かれ、カルカサルの部隊に送られた多くの助けを求める呼びかけが応答されることはなかった。私は誰もこれらの人々を救おうとしないことに気づきました。またはこの…知識を。それで私はその知識を人類の利益のために活用しました」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « J'étais en train de répertorier des données lorsque les attaques ont commencé sur l'un des avant-postes reculés. Au vu des tactiques employées, j'ai immédiatement identifié l'ennemi : des Drukharis. Ils ont jeté leur dévolu sur un monde sans intérêt ni protection où la nuit dure la moitié de l'année ! Nous avons envoyé de nombreux appels de détresse à l'unité de Calcazar, en vain. Après la destruction de cinq avant-postes et la mort du dernier astropathe, j'ai compris que personne n'allait sauver ces gens ni ce... savoir. J'ai donc mis ces connaissances à profit, pour le bien de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais en train de répertorier des données lorsque les attaques ont commencé sur l'un des avant-postes reculés. Au vu des tactiques employées, j'ai immédiatement identifié l'ennemi : des Drukharis. Ils ont jeté leur dévolu sur un monde sans intérêt ni protection où la nuit dure la moitié de l'année ! Nous avons envoyé de nombreux appels de détresse à l'unité de Calcazar, en vain. Après la destruction de cinq avant-postes et la mort du dernier astropathe, j'ai compris que personne n'allait sauver ces gens ni ce... savoir. J'ai donc mis ces connaissances à profit, pour le bien de l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Ich katalogisierte gerade Daten, als die Angriffe auf einen der abgelegenen Außenposten begannen. Anhand der Taktik erkannte ich den Feind sofort: Drukhari. Sie wählten eine unbedeutende Welt, die sich nicht verteidigen konnte und auf der die Nächte ein halbes Jahr dauern. Als die Dunkelheit bereits fünf Außenposten verschlungen hatte, der letzte Astropath in Stücke gerissen war und viele Hilferufe an Calcazars Einheit ohne Antwort geblieben waren, wurde mir klar, dass niemand diese Leute retten würde. Oder ... dieses Wissen. Also habe ich das Wissen benutzt – zum Wohle der Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ich katalogisierte gerade Daten, als die Angriffe auf einen der abgelegenen Außenposten begannen. Anhand der Taktik erkannte ich den Feind sofort: Drukhari. Sie wählten eine unbedeutende Welt, die sich nicht verteidigen konnte und auf der die Nächte ein halbes Jahr dauern. Als die Dunkelheit bereits fünf Außenposten verschlungen hatte, der letzte Astropath in Stücke gerissen war und viele Hilferufe an Calcazars Einheit ohne Antwort geblieben waren, wurde mir klar, dass niemand diese Leute retten würde. Oder ... dieses Wissen. Also habe ich das Wissen benutzt – zum Wohle der Menschheit."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Ücra karakollardan birine saldırılar başladığında veri katalogluyordum. Düşmanı kullandığı taktiklerden ötürü hemen tanıdım, Drukharilerdi. Gecenin yarım yıl boyunca devam ettiği, önemsiz, savunmasız bir dünya seçmişlerdi! Beş karakol karanlık tarafından yutulduktan, son Astropat parçalarına ayrıldıktan ve Calcazar'ın birimine gönderilen sayısız yardım çağrısı yanıtsız kaldıktan sonra kimsenin bu insanları yahut bu bilgileri kurtarmaya gelmeyeceğini fark ettim. Ben de İnsanlığın iyiliği için bilgileri icraata döktüm."
languages.original_text: "I was cataloguing data when the attacks began at one of the remote outposts. I immediately recognised the enemy by their tactics: Drukhari. They chose an unremarkable, defenceless world where night lasts half the year! By the time five outposts had been swallowed by the darkness, the last Astropath had been torn to pieces, and many calls for help sent to Calcazar's unit had gone unanswered, I realised that no one was going to save these people. Or this... knowledge. And so I put the knowledge to use, for the good of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Ücra karakollardan birine saldırılar başladığında veri katalogluyordum. Düşmanı kullandığı taktiklerden ötürü hemen tanıdım: Drukhari. Gecenin yarım yıl boyunca devam ettiği, önemsiz, savunmasız bir dünya seçmişler! Beş karakol karanlık tarafından yutulduktan, son Astropat parçalarına ayrıldıktan ve Calcazar'ın birimine gönderilen sayısız yardım çağrısı yanıtsız kaldıktan sonra bu insanları kurtarmaya kimsenin gelmeyeceğini fark ettim. Veya bu... Bilgiyi. Ben de bilgiyi icraata döktüm. İnsanlığın iyiliği adına."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
